DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To report feasibility obtain preliminary data effect use enhanced Otago Exercise Programme reduce fall risk individual osteoarthritis ( OA ) . Participants : Ten participant Johnston County Osteoarthritis Project OA , risk fall , 65+ year old . Procedures ( method ) : All participant receive 6-month enhanced Otago program . The investigator assemble data : quantifying participant adherence safety intervention , ascertain retention participant 6 month , determine acceptability program , validated measure ( e.g. , number fall fall severity , balance measure ) .
DOC.brief_title: Falls Prevention Program Adults With Osteoarthritis
